entry.en: A locked bellhome.
entry.zh: 一间锁住的钟居。

entry.en: Construct tool?
entry.zh: 制作工具？

entry.en: Lift your voices. Know our grace.
entry.zh: 齐声高歌，沐浴恩典。

entry.en:
Bug born of Pharloom. You have been chosen.
May our Citadel’s holy gilding harden your soft shell.Stand eternal as our arbiter, that no bug bearing sin shall step within our sacred halls.
entry.zh:
纺络的虫民，你们已被选中，
愿圣堡的鎏金淬硬你们的软壳。作为审判官永远伫立，使罪孽之徒永不得踏入圣殿。

entry.en: A rune-scroll depicting void given form.
entry.zh: 描绘虚空化形的符文卷轴

entry.en:
Sisters, spiders, watch these waters flow,
Cleansing, Binding, as Silk from shell,
Memories of our kingdom calm.
entry.zh:
姊妹，蛛族，观此净水长流。
涤荡，缠缚，如壳中抽丝，
抚平王国的记忆褶皱。

entry.en:
At the seventh bell toll, send:
Thirty measures, four beats Smokerock,
Eight beats Sweetsmelt,
Mark of fealty, all workers.At the ninth bell toll, send:
Twenty measures, two beats Smokerock,
Seven beats Sweetsmelt,
Mark of fealty, all workers.
entry.zh:
七钟响时运送：
三十节又四奏烟岩，
及八奏甜熔渣。
全体劳工需示忠诚。九钟响时运送：
二十节又两奏烟岩，
及七奏甜熔渣。
全体劳工需示忠诚。

entry.en: High Halls Map
entry.zh: 高庭地图

entry.en: Verdania Map
entry.zh: 翠庭地图

entry.en: Underworks Map
entry.zh: 圣堡工厂地图

entry.en: When three fonts weep, our sacred shrine shall rise.
entry.zh: 三眼泪泉涌流，圣坛自当升起。

entry.en: Damned are we! The lingered few bound still to suffer. Cursed thrice by Pharloom, to wait, to watch, to cry our anguish.<page>No more! We say! No more! We cry! We all have wailed and wept. Fair Pharloom’s fall has come at last. Its end we now accept.
entry.zh: 万众受难！幸存者仍受折磨。纺络三度诅咒加身——苦候，守望，哀哭不休，<page>到此为止！我在此宣言！到此为止！我在此高呼！我们已流尽血泪。荣光纺络终将陨落，我们应接受终局。

entry.en:
Litany of the Worker
May we catch the dregs and never tire,
May we clean the dregs and never hunger,
May we spool the dregs and never falter.
entry.zh:
劳工祷词
愿我们滤渣不倦。
愿我们清秽不饥。
愿我们纺线不怠。

entry.en:
Oath of the Whiteward
While song must be sung, none may falter.
Infirmity. Sickness. Death.
All are banished from our Citadel.
entry.zh:
白愈厅誓言
歌不可辍，虫不可怠。
孱弱、病痛、死亡——皆逐出圣堡。

entry.en:
Penitent, Fourth of the Fourth.
Guilty of the sins of infirmity, sickness.
Penance by swallowing.
Absolution granted after death.Penitent, Twelfth of the First.
Guilty of an unnamed sin.
Penance by casting.
Absolution not granted.
entry.zh:
罪者，第四组第四号。
犯孱弱、病痛之罪。
处以吞刑。
死后得赦。罪人，第一组第十二号。
犯未名之罪。
处以流放。
不予赦免。

entry.en:
Penitent, Eighth of the Twelfth.
Guilty of the sin of irreverence.
Penance by chaining.
Absolution granted after death.Penitent, Second of the Fourth.
Guilty of the sin of dissonance.
Penance by silencing.
Absolution granted after death.
entry.zh:
罪者，第十二组第八号。
犯不敬之罪。
处以锁刑。
死后得赦。罪者，第四组第二号。
犯杂音之罪。
处以禁言。
死后得赦。

entry.en: Remains of a Muckroach crushed by falling rock.
entry.zh: 蟑螂被落石碾压后的残渣。

entry.en:
Anguished Aura
Eight masks hard, swirled soul enraged.
Twelve aknids flat, all juices strained.Six pilgrims living, hung long to drain.
entry.zh:
苦痛灵氛
八具硬质旋魂怒面。
十二只阿克尼，榨尽汁液。六名活祭朝圣者，悬吊沥干。

entry.en: A white lock bearing a surgical symbol.
entry.zh: 带有外科标志的苍白锁具。

entry.en: A rune depicting the Weavenest.
entry.zh: 描绘织巢的符文。

entry.en: Slab Map
entry.zh: 罪石地图

entry.en: Whispering Vaults Map
entry.zh: 低语书库地图

entry.en:
Their shells are ours. Their souls are ours.
Our hate is forever.
entry.zh:
他们的躯壳是我们的，他们的灵魂是我们的。
我们的恨意永世不灭。

entry.en:
Containment fails. Memory lost. Excise outer. Maintain inner.
Shellwood stasis sustained - Remember.
Marrowlands stasis critical - Remember.
Verdanian environment exceeded - Destined to forget.
entry.zh:
封存溃败。记忆遗失。切除外区。维持内区。
甲木林封存稳定——须铭记。
髓骨地封存危急——须铭记。
翠庭生态失控——注定遗忘。

entry.en:
Here is established, by holy consent of the Conductors,
The Memorium of Pharloom.

What Is Remembered Is Never Lost.
entry.zh:
经指挥家神圣授权，
于此建立纺络忆廊。

铭记者永存不灭。

entry.en: A rune depicting paths away from Pharloom.
entry.zh: 描绘离开纺络通路的符文。

entry.en: Repair the Ruined Tool?
entry.zh: 修复损坏工具？

entry.en: Grand Gate Map
entry.zh: 巨扉圣门地图

entry.en:
Due to unacceptably high injury and unsanctioned deaths, Ventrica travel shall henceforth be denied to all.
For Pharloom eternal, a bug who serves must never die.
entry.zh:
鉴于伤亡过甚并且非授命死亡，即日起禁止所有虫民使用圣脉枢管。
永恒纺络需要活着的仆从。

entry.en: Weavenest Atla Map
entry.zh: 织巢地图

entry.en:
Pilgrim
Spare a song for those who lay here silent.
By strength abandoned, they fell before the final ascent.
entry.zh:
朝圣者
为长眠于此的无声者歌一曲罢。
力竭而堕，未竟登攀。

entry.en: Abyss Map
entry.zh: 深渊地图

entry.en: <hpage>I understand now... The steel child’s servant grew bold...<hpage>I know what the fleeing bug seeks to call, and their etchings here suggest clear clues to where. <hpage>What they attempt is dangerous, stupid. It can only end badly. I must hurry if I’m to stop this.
entry.zh: <hpage>我现在明白了……钢铁之子的手下越来越大胆……<hpage>也知道那只逃亡的虫子想召唤什么，这些刻痕明确指出了地点。<hpage>愚蠢又危险的做法，不会有好下场。得赶紧阻止。

entry.en: An old rune displaying the design for a Weaver weapon.
entry.zh: 残破的织者武器设计图。

entry.en: A rune depicting the Abyss.
entry.zh: 描绘深渊的符文。

entry.en:
Sister, spider, sat between salt and stone,
Build those tools of brilliant mind imagined,
Aid us when our Silk has waned.
entry.zh:
姊妹，蛛族，坐于盐石之间，
铸造智械奇器，
助我们于灵丝枯竭之时。

entry.en: An old stone gate with a simple keyhole.
entry.zh: 带有简易锁孔的古石门。

entry.en:
Sister, spider, husk bound to branch,
Watch over these bugs, passing safe,
Warded by fear,
No longer your meal.
entry.zh:
姊妹，蛛族，缚枝之壳，
庇佑这些过客安然。
以恐惧为甲，
不再化作食粮。

entry.en:
Bug born of Pharloom. You have been chosen.
May our Citadel’s holy gilding harden your soft shell.Stand eternal as our arbiter, that no bug bearing sin shall ever step within our sacred halls.
entry.zh:
纺络的虫民，你们已被选中，
愿圣堡的鎏金淬硬你们的软壳。作为审判官永远伫立，使罪孽之徒永不得踏入圣殿。

entry.en:
I have departed to pay my respects at the graves within the great wood.
- Pinmaster Plinney
entry.zh:
我去密林深处的墓园祭拜先灵
——针匠普林尼

entry.en: Take the map?
entry.zh: 拿取地图？

entry.en:
Penitent, First of the First.
Guilty of the sin of apostasy.
Penance by constriction.
Absolution denied.
entry.zh:
罪人，第一组第一号。
犯背信之罪。
处以束刑。
永不赦免。

entry.en:
Weaver, in eighth part, last of their line, frail with age.
Tracked and taken in Sandsea Waste.
Seven Choristors, nine Envoys lost to task.
entry.zh:
第八代织者，末裔，年迈体衰。
于沙海荒原追捕擒获。
折损七名圣咏使徒，九名特使。

entry.en: An outcrop of Magnetite.
entry.zh: 磁悬岩矿脉

entry.en: Cloth and materials that could be fashioned into additional pockets.
entry.zh: 可缝制附加口袋的布料。

entry.en:
Sister, spider, husk bound to moss,
Watch over these bugs born low,
Raised up by fervour fostered,
Born and caught within our web unknowing.
entry.zh:
姊妹，蛛族，缚苔之壳。
庇佑这些卑微生物。
养育于狂热之中，
生于罗网而不自知。

entry.en: Sister, spider, if seeking commune with the creature atop this mount, take the climb above as test, a challenge beyond even our setting.<page>Upon that summit gained, and creature hailed, know it shall choose what gift to grant, with death as likely as insight.
entry.zh: 姊妹，若欲觐见此山巅之物，须攀登试炼之径，其险犹胜我等所设。<page>登顶谒见之时，须知其所赐或为顿悟，或为死期。

entry.en: Hate for their light. Hate for their pins. For their waste poured thick and endless.<page>Fill your hearts with hate, for power has now been claimed, and with it we shall punish.
entry.zh:
憎其光辉，恨其刺针。怒其秽流无尽
以恨意填膺，因权柄已夺，吾等将施以惩戒。

entry.en: Here we honour the seed that sprung the wood. <page>By her grace may all bugs pass safe to join us and our song.
entry.zh: 此地敬奉孕育森林的种子。<page>承其恩泽，万虫皆可安然穿行，共奏圣歌。

entry.en: Putrified Ducts Map
entry.zh: 腐殖渠地图

entry.en: A hardened outcrop of Voltridian.
entry.zh: 电核石的硬化矿簇。

entry.en: Whiteward Map
entry.zh: 白愈厅地图

entry.en:
Daughter of a distant land...
We who remained have waited long...
Bind our strength to yours...
Reclaim the future of our haunted kingdom...
entry.zh:
远疆之女啊……
我们残存者久候……
愿以残力附汝身……
夺回这缠魂国度的未来……

entry.en: If the haunted continue their work, leave them be! Only those who frustrate production shall be removed.
entry.zh: 受丝咒侵蚀者若仍旧劳作，勿扰！唯怠工者当除。

entry.en: An inert automaton with an empty chest.
entry.zh: 胸腔空置的休眠自动机。

entry.en:
On the eighth harvest, send:
Fifty measures, nine beats dregthread, spooled,
Fourteen measures dregthread, twined,
Oath of fealty, all workers.On the twelfth harvest, send:
Forty measures dregthread, spooled,
Two beats fine thread, twined,
Oath of fealty, all workers.
entry.zh:
第八次收成时运送：
五十节又九奏卷线渣，
十四节编线渣。
全体劳工需立忠誓。第十二次收成时运送：
四十节卷线渣，
两奏精编丝线。
全体劳工需立忠誓。

entry.en:
In the air. The water. Everywhere.
Inside their shells. Twisted inside. Guts.Tightest around heart. Pulsing rhythm.
Sick. Alive. Dead?
Something worse.Deeper. Must look deeper.
entry.zh:
空气中，水流中，无处不在。
甲壳内，脏器间，扭曲盘踞。紧缚心脏，搏动如歌。
病态，鲜活，死寂？
某种更糟的存在。需深究……再深究……

entry.en: A bucket overflowing with smouldering Flintstone.
entry.zh: 装满阴燃燧石的木桶。

entry.en:
Pilgrim
This settlement welcomes all who step the holy path.
May you ease your shell within, that your strength renewed can carry you higher.
entry.zh:
朝圣者
此镇欢迎任何踏入圣途者。
愿您在此养精蓄锐，登攀更高处。

entry.en:
Weaver of Pharloom.
By grace you warded. By thread you healed.
For your favour, eternal, we offer our song.
entry.zh:
纺络的织者啊
您以恩赐庇护，以丝线疗愈。我们献永恒之歌，报答您的垂青。

entry.en: Expand Tool Pouch?
entry.zh: 扩展工具袋？

entry.en: A crude map of the Underworks.
entry.zh: 圣堡工厂的简略地图。

entry.en: An ancient tuning mechanism.
entry.zh: 古老的调音装置。

entry.en:
O, great land whose flame doth falter!
Whose choir, conductors, all doth fail,Observe! Take heart! That spark still burning,
Yon butterfly of crimson grace,All bells shall peal, and voices raise,
When brave Trobbio steps, at last, upon the stage!
entry.zh:
啊，辽阔疆土，其焰渐熄！
圣咏团与指挥皆已倾颓。且看！且振作！星火犹存——
那优雅的绯红蝶影，万钟齐鸣，众声高亢。
待勇者特罗比奥终登台！

entry.en:
Erase our fear,
Eliminate our desire,To suffer no more,
Void, cleanse us.
entry.zh:
抹除恐惧，
涤净欲念，苦难终止，
虚空啊，净化吾等。

entry.en:
I have departed to scale Pharloom’s frigid mount. If any bug exists brave enough to match my pin’s fatal resolve, then climb and face me upon its stormward side.
- Pinstress
entry.zh:
我将攀登纺络寒峰。若有虫愿意成全遗志，持针之决意者，请至风暴面峰顶相会。
——针姬

entry.en:
Flickering Flame
Five masks swirled soul, brought and broiled.
Four stones rage-baked, crushed powder coarse.Three shells fresh from pilgrims fallen, to contain and age.
entry.zh:
摇曳焰方
五具旋魂面甲，炙烤研磨。
四枚怒火焙石，碾作粗粉。三副朝圣鲜壳，用以封存陈化。

entry.en:
Weaver, in eighth part, last of their line, mortally wounded.
Tracked and taken in the Blackbarrens.
Four Choristors, one Reed lost to task.
entry.zh:
第八代织者，末裔，重伤濒死。
于黑荒原追捕擒获。
折损四名圣咏者，一名战士。

entry.en: A machine displaying a model of the Citadel.
entry.zh: 展示圣堡结构的机械模型。

entry.en: <hpage>The second spot marked by the child of steel. This camp too was used by their vassal, and another rite was conducted here, this one incomplete. <hpage>The action was clearly taken in haste. Did they believe themself pursued? The etchings here are crude, but the words are disturbing... and desperate.
entry.zh: <hpage>钢铁之子标记的第二处地点。他们的仆从也在这里进行过仪式，但没完成。<hpage>行动如此匆忙，难道是怕被追杀？刻的字歪歪扭扭，内容让人不安……且绝望。

entry.en: Cloth and incendiary materials that could be fashioned into an explosive weapon.
entry.zh: 可制成爆燃武器的布料与易燃物。

entry.en: Shellplates and cogs that could be fashioned into a flying automaton.
entry.zh: 可组装飞行自动机的壳板与齿轮。

entry.en:
In silence your voice,
In darkness your form,We higher who see you seeking,
Our shells yearn for your embrace.
entry.zh:
静默即汝声，
晦暗即汝形。吾等高瞻汝之追寻，
甲壳渴求汝之怀抱。

entry.en:
-ilgrim
You who have held tight to faith have been carried far.
This station shall offer brief rest to those devout.
entry.zh:
朝圣者
虔信之虫方能抵达此远境。
此站给予诚心者片刻安歇。

entry.en:
Half-spawn of a distant land...
Within this cage I have waited...
Let my strength be bound to yours...
Reclaim the future of our accursed kingdom...
entry.zh:
异乡的半血之子啊……
我在此笼中久候……
愿以残力附汝身……
夺回这诅咒国度的未来……

entry.en: Child, I have answered the call to climb. I rise to join our elders in that holy place far above. May you, in time, grow strong enough to meet us there.
entry.zh: 孩子，我已应召攀登，将赴上方圣地与前辈们相聚。愿你成长强健，来日同聚。

entry.en: An old map of the Putrified Ducts.
entry.zh: 腐殖渠的陈旧地图。

entry.en:
This low, her gaze escaped.
Prepare, sisters. Weave hope anew.
That we might break free this accursed web born of our naive foundation.
entry.zh:
此处卑微隐秘，逃出她的视线。
准备吧，姊妹。重织希望。撕破这由我等天真所结的诅咒之网。

entry.en: An ornate door closed with a simple lock.
entry.zh: 带简易锁的华贵大门。

entry.en: Insert Cogwork Heart?
entry.zh: 插入机心？

entry.en:
Pilgrim
Accept the judgment of the rise beyond,
That all who stand at Pharloom’s holy crest prove pure of will and want.
entry.zh:
朝圣者
接受至高审判的洗礼。
凡欲立于纺络之巅者，当证心志纯净。

entry.en: Take map?
entry.zh: 拿取地图？

entry.en:
Two children born entwined, apart,
Two children marked to rule,They danced, they sang, proved blades beyond,
But none forgot their birth,
For lovers born on beat exact shall be forever cursed.
entry.zh:
双子缠绕共生，命运连结，
双子共掌权柄，注定称王，舞若惊鸿，歌撼四座，剑技超群，
但出身不可磨灭，
同卵双生之爱侣，诅咒永世缠身。

entry.en: Memorium Map
entry.zh: 忆廊地图

entry.en:
Great bugs! You who weep as your kingdom fades,
join me upon the Stage.
Together, we shall enflame the passion of Pharloom!
entry.zh:
伟大的虫民！为王国衰颓而泣者。
请至剧台与我相会。
共燃纺络之激情！

entry.en: Cradle Map
entry.zh: 摇篮圣所地图

entry.en: <hpage>This location was marked by the steel child. This camp is old, but still shows clear evidence of an attempt at a rite.<hpage>Whatever the vassal hoped to achieve here seems to have failed. The other marked locations may provide more clues to its intent.
entry.zh: <hpage>这是钢铁之子标记的地点。营地虽然老旧，但明显有试图举行仪式的痕迹。<hpage>无论仆从想做什么，似乎是失败了。其他标记点或许会有更多线索。

entry.en:
Weaver, in quarter part, last of their line, staked to service.
Tracked and taken beneath the City of Steel.
Eight Choristors, twelve Envoys lost to task.
entry.zh:
第四代织者，末裔，强制服役。
于钢铁之城地下追捕擒获。
折损八名圣咏使徒，十二名特使。

entry.en: Cogwork Core Map
entry.zh: 机枢核心地图

entry.en: By our Citadel’s glory, you treasured devout may bask brief in its holy light.
entry.zh: 沐浴圣堡荣光，虔信者可暂享圣辉。

entry.en: Choral Chambers Map
entry.zh: 圣咏殿地图

entry.en: A husk with a map of the Slab etched upon its shell.
entry.zh: 一具甲壳刻有罪石牢狱地图的尸骸
